thread.text: Dwelling is the poison ☠️of society 🌎… this should be shared at a record rate, because everyone has someone in their family or inner circle that can’t stop complaining about the past… pls share this post with at least one person, the greatest gift we can give someone we love is the ability to let go of something that isn’t contributing to their tomorrow ♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️☀️🩵

replies.text: A Saturday morning ☀️ video that may hit for many … a lot to think about in this reality but as always … self esteem, actual self esteem is the answer ♥️💛
The 2010 throw back on this Friday night …. Listen csrefully to the mashup ! Tell me where u are on this journey ????

8% of the year is gone … are you putting what you promised to put in place a month ago into action ? Send this to someone who might need a bump on this rainy ☔️ day in NYC 🍎 and I hope it gets them going on 2024 … 2024 can be the best year ever … go for it
Some fun in the Uk 🇬🇧… green and Ireland 🇮🇪 love tonight …. A little smile 😊 always goes a long way … I love all of you and love meeting u all on the road
MID DAY reMINDer .. which one of these hits most for the place you are in life right now !!!!
Some reminders this evening 🌙…. Which of these hits the most for you and why? Also which are you sharing? And where? And finally pick one and text 2 friends … passing the vibes is always the way 🫛🚁🫒🔗

Pls stop dwelling …. It’s the #1 thing holding you back … it’s over.. there is no Time Machine … you can’t go back .. learn from it and move on … I am stunned how many DM’s I get where this is the answer 🌶️🌶️🌶️🌶️🧨
Too many of you need this today …. I hope this clip puts some of you into motion 🗯️💭
2024 … the year to get uncomfortable
You got to Ying while they Yang .. under priced attention .. day trading attention is a real skill.. I was focused on it in 2014 and I’m focused on it in 2024 … are you seeing things others don’t ???
Which of these 5 did you “need” this morning …8% of 2024 is already over … are you already off the New Year’s resolution??? You’re in control, you just have to decide ♥️
Once you understand the “flip” you can become successful … lean into it .. own it .. love it 😍

Too many stay still … just think they are cool the way it is … the issue is, if you think you’re just chillin, you’re good, often it means you’re creating the foundation to slide back … work on your relationships, your products, your services, your teams … complacency isn’t content .. be thoughtful on this one … pass to a friend who needs this 🩵

Some Monday morning observations that I hope help you this week 💛☀️… which one did you like best? Which one hits home most? Which one did you share in your instagram story? Which one did you post in your family group chat ??? See u all tonight at 815ET for the live Q&A .. link 🔗 in bio

It’s time
… share this with someone tonight … 2024 has to be that year
Stop doing shit for the “stuff”…start doing shit  for the “feelings”
5 simple thoughts 📄 for this Friday … which one of these 5 hits the most for you ?? Which one you sharing with your family group chat ? 🩵

Pay really close attention to the variables here …. Buy whatever you want … but if you are complaining about money … 💰…. You need to audit your behavior in 2024! Who’s ready ? Share this with someone who’s complaining or struggling to figure it out ♥️♥️♥️

Don’t beat yourself up …. We are all trying out here … the judgement on one’s self is a serious issue in today’s society, a little more grace, a little less pressure, a little less anxious energy, simplify life … take a deep breath :) … send this to a great mom ♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️

Brandon is family and allowed me to do my thing cause I knew he had my duties covered, obviously my dad did his thing and my cousin Bobby did his thing but brand was able to pick up what I did and that allowed me to jump in full time with @ajv and my next chapter … he deserves a lot of flowers 🌺 from me and I am sure many of you have those people in your life … give them flowers in the comments and then text them out of the blue and do it too !
That last line ! … understand?

Yesterday is over , the decisions of the past are done .. dwelling is a disease 🦠 so many people have … please send this to someone that keeps rehashing old shit and just needs to build the strength to move on and learn and build from it … this statement can really help a lot of people finally move on and actually build towards happiness versus wallowing in darkness …please make 2024 the year you learn to forgive.. either others or most importantly …Yourself 💚💚💚💚💚
Stop worrying about what they think … don’t try to be fast and “look it”  be patient and actually “be it” 🔥💛

Who’s ready to finally smile ??? Happiness comes from not seeking or needing validation from an human from the outside and being empathetic and sympathetic to others poor behaviors … cause you’re good .. within yourself ♥️♥️♥️♥️
